content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the current state report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-28.0, y=-61.0) with coal fuel
- Storage chest (x=-27.5, y=-59.5) containing copper ore
- Burner inserter (x=-26.5, y=-59.5) moving items right
- Stone furnace (x=-25.0, y=-59.0) smelting copper ore
- Burner inserter (x=-23.5, y=-58.5) moving items right
- Storage chest (x=-22.5, y=-58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-18.0, y=-53.0) with coal fuel
- Storage chest (x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
- Burner inserter (x=-16.5, y=-51.5) moving items right
- Stone furnace (x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
- Burner inserter (x=-13.5, y=-50.5) moving items right
- Storage chest (x=-12.5, y=-50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=41.0, y=-82.0) with coal fuel
- Storage chest (x=41.5, y=-80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (x=41.5, y=-79.5)

### Science Pack Production Setup
Consists of:
- Input chest (x=5.5, y=13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter (x=6.5, y=13.5) moving items right
- Assembling machine (x=8.5, y=13.5) crafting automation science packs
- Burner inserter (x=10.5, y=13.5) moving items right
- Output chest (x=11.5, y=13.5) containing automation science packs
- Lab researching logistics

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-3.5, y=27.5) producing water
- Boiler (x=-4.5, y=16.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine (x=-4.5, y=12.5) generating power
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water and steam
- Electricity network connecting various machines

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Extraction Errors
- Verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Check container position is correct before extraction
- Ensure extraction amount is not greater than available items

### Production Flow Issues
- Ensure proper fuel supply to all burner machines
- Monitor input/output container space to prevent blockages
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production

### Entity Placement Issues
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper supply chain
- Some machines show "waiting for space in destination" - clear output blockages
- Boiler shows "out of fuel" warning - maintain constant fuel supply
